content: Ami la vita? Quindi non perdere tempo! Perché questa è la materia di cui è fatta la vita.
translations: eng:Do you love life﹖ Then don't waste time! Because that's the stuff life is made of
eng:Dost thou love life﹖ Then do not squander time, for that is the stuff life is made of
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
